metadata.name: tree
metadata.description:
Trees are found in myths of every nation.
Some of these trees have guards and some are havens for fictional creatures.
In Iranian culture, tree has always had a sacred and special place; thus in the eyes of ancient Iranians, tree which dies every year, comes back to life, and bears fruits, has a special and sacred power.
_________________
 
The painting of the tree_ which the video is based on _ was first created with the technique of oil painting on canvas in 2020
_______________

Project setting : 24 f/s , 1080*1080, 0:13, 12.33 mb
Softwares : photoshop , moho
